Articles.Content: It came to my attention that there is a save converter from 0.20 to 0.21, does anyone have a link? can't find on the forums
It's not standalone. Just try loading a 0.20 save into 0.21 and it'll give you the option to attempt conversion. You may want to back it up beforehand, even if the game does do it as well.
thanx i made the conversion and it appears that everything is in place
